Klinsmann leans on Europe-based players to break South Korea's Asian Cup droughtSouth Korea coach Juergen Klinsmann will look to captain Son Heung-min and his squad's Europe-based players to steer the nation to their first Asian Cup title in 64 years when he leads his team into next month's continental championship in Qatar. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 03:51:15 GMT 4M6JNS3OEJJUTKSFZW3ESQ75NE https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/klinsmann-leans-europe-based-players-break-south-koreas-asian-cup-drought-2023-12-28/Michael Church运动的足球
Alibaba must face lawsuit in US over counterfeit SquishmallowsA U.S. judge on Wednesday rejected Alibaba's bid to dismiss a lawsuit over the alleged sale by various merchants of counterfeit versions of the popular children's toy Squishmallows on its online platforms. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 20:22:02 GMT 5ASM3FKTLFM2PH35BBMYNRHXUY https://www.reuters.com/legal/alibaba-must-face-lawsuit-us-over-counterfeit-squishmallows-2023-12-27/Jonathan Stempel合法的交易性
China aims to expand domestic demand, ensure speedy recoveryChina will strive to expand domestic demand, ensure a speedy economic recovery and promote stable growth, according to an interim report on China's 14th five-year plan published by parliament on Wednesday. India net importer of steel in April-Nov as Chinese shipments reach 5-yr highIndia turned a net importer of finished steel in the first eight months of the fiscal year that began in April with shipments from China reaching their highest in five years, according to provisional government data seen by Reuters on Wednesday. New World and China Resources to build $1.3 bln Hong Kong housing developmentHong Kong's New World Development and Chinese state-backed China Resources Land said they will jointly build a $1.3 billion housing project in the financial city's "Northern Metropolis" next year. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 09:13:06 GMT DXXZGPEFWNLZPDG2RFNUEAWDTA https://www.reuters.com/business/new-world-china-resources-build-13-bln-hong-kong-housing-development-2023-12-27/Reuters商业
BYD has obtained conditional testing license for level 3 autonomous driving on high-speed roadsChinese electric vehicle giant BYD , said on Wednesday it has obtained a conditional testing license for level 3 (L3) autonomous driving on high-speed roads.
